sentences.en: Boreal forests occupy the subarctic zone and are generally evergreen and coniferous.
sentences.cn: 北部森林占据亚北极区地带而通常是常绿和松树类.

sentences.en: Drag onto the page, then right - click to make coniferous or deciduous.
sentences.cn: 拖到绘图页上, 然后右击,使之成为针叶树或落叶树.

sentences.en: Drag to add a tree. You can configure the tree as coniferous or deciduous.
sentences.cn: 通过拖动添加树木. 可将树木设置为针叶树或落叶树.

sentences.en: Examples are heath associations and coniferous forest associations.
sentences.cn: 例如荒原群丛和针叶林群丛.

sentences.en: Fusions were common between strains from deciduous hosts or coniferous hosts.
sentences.cn: 来自阔叶树或针叶树寄生的菌系间融合是普遍的.

sentences.en: Habitats in tropical and subtropical mountain forest, coniferous forest, forest edge grass, bamboo forest or savanna.
sentences.cn: 栖息于热带、亚热带的山地阔叶林 、 针阔混交林 、 林缘草坡 、 竹林或稀树草原.

sentences.en: Most of the Siberian regional climate is temperate coniferous forests.
sentences.cn: 西伯利亚大部分地区属温带针叶林气候.

sentences.en: Natural vegetation in temperate, warm temperate deciduous, broad - leaved, coniferous forest and deciduous shrubs dominated.
sentences.cn: 自然植被以温带 、 暖温带落叶 、 阔叶 、 针叶林和落叶灌木为主.

sentences.en: On these soils, pine dominates and makes up the coniferous border with the montane birch forest.
sentences.cn: 在这些土壤, 杉木控制并且组成与山桦树森林的具球果边界.

sentences.en: Pulp made from softwood ( coniferous ) trees, e . g. fir. pine spruce . As distinct from pulp.
sentences.cn: 用软木 ( 针叶树 ),例如枞, 松, 杉等, 所制成的纸浆有别于硬木浆.

sentences.en: Softwood pulp: Pulp made from softwood ( coniferous ) trees, e . g. fir. pine, spruce . As distinct from Hardwood pulp.
sentences.cn: 软木浆: 用软木 ( 针叶树 ), 例如枞, 松, 杉等,所制成的纸浆有别于硬木浆.

sentences.en: Sphaeropsis saline is a destructive pathogen of coniferous species in many areas of the world.
sentences.cn: 松枯梢病菌是一种分布广泛、为害严重的世界性病原真菌.

sentences.en: This coniferous tree has a conical silhouette and thick bark.
sentences.cn: 这种针叶树为圆锥形,厚厚的树皮.

sentences.en: Vegetation in the reserve includes: deciduous forest, coniferous broad - leafforestforest, Alpine bush woods, and grass land, etc.
sentences.cn: 区内植被包括原生 阔叶树 林、针阔叶树混交林 、 针叶树林 、 高山灌丛与草生地等山地植物相.

words.tran_cn: 针叶树；[植] 松柏科植物

phrases.tran_cn: n. 针叶树；针叶树针叶树Y
